item.title: Multisite Activation - WordPress Plugin Development - CodeTab
item.description: 11.3.Â WordPress Multisite Activation In the previous blog, we installed and configured WordPress Multisite. In this blog, we explain the plugin activation in Multisite Installations. Multisite Super Admin and Site Admins WordPress Multisite Installation will have a Super Admin (SA) to manage the network and multiple admins to manage the sites in the network. In multisite, only SA can install (add) and update the plugins and site admins are not allowed to do so.
